graph.packing

Class DBBNodeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.packing.DBBNodeBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable, TaskObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DBBNode0, DBBNode1

    public abstract class DBBNodeBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable, TaskObject
    represents a node in the distributed (cluster parallel) version of the B&B tree of the hybrid B&B - GASP scheme for packing problems. Not part of the public API. Essentially, this class factors-out the functionality required of DBBNode* objects by the "main" classes DBBTree and DBBGASPPacker in this package, and lets sub-classes implement the way the node-ids will be stored/retrieved/edited.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2017

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static double _ff
      defines a multiplicative fudge factor by which the "best cost" of graph-nodes is allowed to be "over" so as to still be considered "best" for inclusion in the getBestNodes2Add(DBBNode) method and further consideration.
      private static boolean _ffAllowed2Change
      guard member to ensure the value of _ff doesn't change after DBBNode objects are created.

    • Field Detail

      • _ff

        private static double _ff
        defines a multiplicative fudge factor by which the "best cost" of graph-nodes is allowed to be "over" so as to still be considered "best" for inclusion in the getBestNodes2Add(DBBNode) method and further consideration. This value is allowed to change until a call to disallowFFChanges() is made by any thread.

      • _ffAllowed2Change

        private static boolean _ffAllowed2Change
        guard member to ensure the value of _ff doesn't change after DBBNode objects are created.

        compute the cost of this DBBNode object.

      • getNodeIdsAsSet

        protected abstract java.util.Set getNodeIdsAsSet()
        sub-classes such as DBBNode1 return their corresponding data member. Other sub-classes however that implement the store the node-ids as bit-vectors, need to construct a Set of Integers and return it.
        Returns:
        Set

      • getBound

        protected abstract double getBound()
        compute a valid bound on the cost (really, the profit) of this solution, ie a number above which any complete solution to MWIS containing all the nodes that this solution contains, cannot go.
        Returns:
        double

      • disallowFFChanges

        static void disallowFFChanges()
        disallow changes to _ff. Called only from the DBBGASPAcker class.

      • setFF

        static void setFF(double val)
        set the value of _ff field. Called only from the DBBGASPPacker class before any DBBNode objects are constructed or executed on threads.
        Parameters:
        val - double
